text: To get a cape in Minecraft,
you will first need to install OptiFine.
Check the description below

for a separate tutorial
on downloading OptiFine.
Next, head over to OptiFine.net

or use the link in the
description instead.

Then go over to "Donate"
at the top of the site.
That should lead you to this page.
To get a cape, you will need

to donate $10 to OptiFine
through this page.

Enter your Minecraft
username in this slot here.
Under the usernames slot,
you can see there is a design option.

OptiFine gives you the
standard OptiFine cape
in various colors,
but you can also customize your own cape

by either selecting the
"Custom" or "Banner" option.
Of course, you can always go back
and change your cape's design or color
after purchasing it.

Now simply hit enter after
typing in your username.
After doing so, you'll be asked
to enter in your email address.
After you've done that, hit enter again.

You can choose between the
payment methods given on the left
and select which option suits you best.
After purchasing the cape,

you can now go into your
game to check it out.

Make sure you launch
the game using OptiFine
to be able to see it.

If you wish to change
your design or cape color,
go to "Options" in your Minecraft game.
Next, go to "Skin Customization,"
click on the "OptiFine Cape" option,
and then click on "Open Cape Editor."
You will be automatically redirected
to the cape editor page.
This is where you will be able to edit

and customize your cape's
design at any time.
And that's all you need to do
in order to get a cape in Minecraft.
